geminitranslator-ca-translate: Label for the tab or menu item that opens the translation dialog.
geminitranslator-dialog-title: Title of the popup dialog window where users select the language.
geminitranslator-dialog-prompt: Label asking the user to input the language code (e.g., 'es').
geminitranslator-dialog-go: Label for the primary action button to start translation.
geminitranslator-dialog-cancel: Label for the cancel button in the dialog.
geminitranslator-login-required: Warning message shown to anonymous users on virtual pages. Links to the login page.
geminitranslator-viewing-live:
Notice shown at the top of a translated page.
* $1 is the full title of the original page (for the link).
* $2 is the display text of the original page title.
geminitranslator-ui-error: Tooltip text shown when hovering over a specific block of text that failed to translate.
geminitranslator-error-no-api-key: Error message shown when the extension is not configured correctly on the server.
geminitranslator-error-bad-response: Error message shown when Google Gemini returns 500 or malformed JSON.
